meanings.sent1: She straightens her hair every morning before school.
meanings.sent2: He straightens the picture frame on the wall to make it level.
meanings.sent3: The cat straightens its tail when it sees a bird outside.
meanings.sent4: The teacher straightens the rows of desks in the classroom like a commander.
meanings.sent5: The sun straightens the shadows as it rises higher in the sky.

meanings.definition: To make or become less crooked or bent.
meanings.sent1: He straightens the wire coat hanger to hang his shirt.
meanings.sent2: The chiropractor straightens the patient's spine during the session.
meanings.sent3: The tree straightens its branches after the storm passes.
meanings.sent4: The road straightens out as we drive further into the countryside.
meanings.sent5: The tailor straightens the fabric before cutting it for the dress.
